lo23.data.serializer
Class Serializer

java.lang.Object
  lo23.data.serializer.Serializer

public class Serializer
extends java.lang.Object

This is the util class used for every serialization This class has to contain static methods and attributes only

getProfileIds

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getProfileIds()
Get all the Profile IDs stored in Constants.PROFILES_PATH and create any necessary but nonexistent parent directories.

Returns:
the profile IDs

saveProfile

public static void saveProfile(Profile profile,
                               java.lang.String path,
                               java.lang.String profileId)
                        throws NoIdException,
                               java.io.IOException
This method serializes a given Profile object to a given path

Parameters:
profile - The object to serialize
path - The path where the profile is serialized
profileId - The profile ID. Set to "" to permit exportation of profile with personnalised file name
Throws:
NoIdException - This exception is thrown if profile argument doesn't have a correct profileId
java.io.IOException

readProfile2

public static Profile readProfile2(java.lang.String filePath)
                            throws FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
This method tries to read a profile whom id and file paths are given as paramater

Parameters:
profileId - The profileId for the expected profile
path - The path from where the profile is read
Returns:
Either a Profil object, either a null value if something went wrong (IOException or file not found)
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - This exception is thrown when this method can't have access to an expected file
